price: [They will be told,] “Eat and drink joyfully for what you did[5] in the days gone by.”
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ
footnotes: [5] Lit., "advanced" anticipating the reward in the Hereafter.
